props.name: count
props.description: For counter buttons, the number to display.

props.name: leadingIcon
props.description: An icon to display before the button text.

props.name: leadingVisual
props.description: A visual to display before the button text.

props.name: loading
props.description: When true, the button is in a loading state.

props.name: loadingAnnouncement
props.description: The content to announce to screen readers when loading.

props.name: trailingIcon
props.description: An icon to display after the button text.

props.name: trailingVisual
props.description: A visual to display after the button text.

props.name: variant
props.description: Change the visual style of the button.
